page.description: Remove any occurence of the subexpression from an expression - removes any intervening operators as well.
page.syntax: New_Expression as C = EXPRESSION_SUBEXPRESSION_ELIMINATE( C expression, C subexpression)
page.discussion: EXPRESSION_SUBEXPRESSION_ELIMINATE() returns a character string by removing any occurrence of the Sub_Expression from the Expression. In doing so, the function eliminates any intervening operators.
